title: 玩家无法进入服务器
author: 超级菜鸡白
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Tollainmear 于 2019-4-5 12:40 编辑 

客户端显示的远程主机强制关闭连接.
控制台显示的是io.netty.handler.codec.DecoderException: java.lang.RuntimeException: An internal error occured.
at io.netty.handler.codec.ByteToMessageDecoder.channelInputClosed(ByteToMessageDecoder.java:375) ~[ByteToMessageDecoder.class:4.1.9.Final]
at io.netty.handler.codec.ByteToMessageDecoder.channelInactive(ByteToMessageDecoder.java:325) ~[ByteToMessageDecoder.class:4.1.9.Final]
at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelInactive(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:231) [AbstractChannelHandlerContext.class:4.1.9.Final]
at io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter.channelInactive(ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter.java:75) [ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter.class:4.1.9.Final]
at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelInactive(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:231) [AbstractChannelHandlerContext.class:4.1.9.Final]
at io.netty.handler.codec.ByteToMessageDecoder.channelInputClosed(ByteToMessageDecoder.java:360) [ByteToMessageDecoder.class:4.1.9.Final]
at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelInactive(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:245) [AbstractChannelHandlerContext.class:4.1.9.Final]
at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.fireChannelInactive(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:224) [AbstractChannelHandlerContext.class:4.1.9.Final]
at io.netty.handler.timeout.IdleStateHandler.channelInactive(IdleStateHandler.java:278) [IdleStateHandler.class:4.1.9.Final]
at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelInactive(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:231) [AbstractChannelHandlerContext.class:4.1.9.Final]
at io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline$HeadContext.channelInactive(DefaultChannelPipeline.java:1329) [DefaultChannelPipeline$HeadContext.class:4.1.9.Final]
at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelInactive(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:231) [AbstractChannelHandlerContext.class:4.1.9.Final]
at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannel$AbstractUnsafe$7.run(AbstractChannel.java:744) [AbstractChannel$AbstractUnsafe$7.class:4.1.9.Final]
at io.netty.util.concurrent.SingleThreadEventExecutor.runAllTasks(SingleThreadEventExecutor.java:403) [SingleThreadEventExecutor.class:4.1.9.Final]
at io.netty.util.concurrent.SingleThreadEventExecutor$5.run(SingleThreadEventExecutor.java:858) [SingleThreadEventExecutor$5.class:4.1.9.Final]
Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: An internal error occured.
at com.comphenix.protocol.injector.netty.ChannelInjector.decode(ChannelInjector.java:490) ~[?:?]
... 30 more
at net.minecraft.network.NettyPacketDecoder.decode(NettyPacketDecoder.java:31) ~[gz.class:?]
at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43) ~[?:1.8.0_192]
at com.comphenix.protocol.reflect.accessors.DefaultMethodAccessor.invoke(DefaultMethodAccessor.java:16) ~[?:?]
at io.netty.handler.codec.ByteToMessageDecoder.callDecode(ByteToMessageDecoder.java:411) ~[ByteToMessageDecoder.class:4.1.9.Final]
... 30 more

replies.author: 帕帕武
replies.txt_content:
1检查服务端防火墙是否关闭 面板服除外
2.服务器和客户端MOD是否一致
3.玩家网络原因
4.服务端本身有问题

replies.author: miao272488
replies.txt_content:
1.更改DNS
2.服务器负载过多，家庭网络不稳定
3.重新下载客户端

replies.author: xsfcaDcsa
replies.txt_content: 看看你服务器的防火墙 策略组

replies.author: 超级菜鸡白
replies.txt_content:
暖雨泪 发表于 2019-4-6 13:21
服务器防火墙问题呀？
面板服不会有防火墙问题吧。。
